patches.name: Drum Machine
patches.description: Build your own drum machine! Use the W A S D keys on your keyboard to play some drums ü•Å

patches.name: Chord Progression
patches.description: An infinitely descending chord progression made with dsp~ üéπ
patches.author: @dtinth

patches.name: Haunted Lead
patches.description: A slow, haunting lead with an audio-reactive visual made with Strudel and Hydra üòà
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: FM Synth
patches.description: FM synthesis visualized with osc~, expr, gain~ and fft~ üì°
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: ChucK the Fourth
patches.description: ChucK composition with arp, melody, kick drum, bassline & feedback delay üéπ
patches.author: @dtinth

patches.name: Upbeat Expressions
patches.description: A beat made entirely with mathematical expressions in expr~ ü§ì
patches.author: @kijjaz

patches.name: Dreamy Orca Tones
patches.description: A dreamy lullaby made with basic Orca operators and Tone.js polyphonic synth üò¥
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Virtual Smooth Jazz
patches.description: A virtual smooth jazz band made with SpessaSynth and WebMIDILink. Click on iframe to play üé∑
patches.author: @kijjaz

patches.name: Drum Sequencer
patches.description: Automated drum sequencer that plays samples. Use P to play and K to stop ü•Å
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Funk 42
patches.description: How to funk in 42 lines of code. Original code by @froos using Strudel
patches.author: @froos

patches.name: Scales
patches.description: Musical scale experiments made with osc~, expr, expr~, delay~ and highpass~
patches.author: @kijjaz

patches.name: Scales II
patches.description: Alternative version of the scale experiments with a slightly different feel to it
patches.author: @kijjaz

patches.name: Chromatic Sampler
patches.description: A simple sampler that plays your sample at different playback speeds depending on the note
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Simple Synth Keyboard
patches.description: A simple synth made with virtual midi keyboard, osc~, trigger, expr, adsr, mtof and gain~
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Periodic Wave Oscillator
patches.description: Creates a periodic wave to shape the oscillator output
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Distortion Curve Waveshaper
patches.description: Creates a distortion curve to shape the waveshaper output
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Kicks
patches.description: Basic drum kicks made with mathematical expressions in expr~
patches.author: @dtinth

patches.name: Audio Reactive Circle
patches.description: Uses a shadertoy shader from @airtight with a basic strudel melody
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Oscillated Slider
patches.description: Visualize an oscillation using slider, fft~ and js
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: 8 Pad Sampler
patches.description: Sample from your microphone and trigger samples with keyboard and MIDI inputs
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Random Walk World
patches.description: Uses p5.js to create random walkers, and Hydra to mix them with a pink wobbly shader
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Random Walk Lullaby
patches.description: Combines the Random Walk World patch with the Orca Tones patch for a gentle chaos
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Signed Distance Flowers
patches.description: GLSL shader from @dtinth's talk 'the power of signed distance functions'
patches.author: @dtinth

patches.name: X-Y Distance Flowers
patches.description: Adds an X-Y pad to adjust the pattern zoom and petal opacity of @dtinth's SDF shader
patches.author: @dtinth

patches.name: Sleek Animated Torus
patches.description: Uses three.js with texture from hydra.js to create an animated torus knot
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Patt Vira's P5.js Sketches
patches.description: Showcases two of @pattvira's P5.js sketches from her YouTube tutorials
patches.author: @pattvira

patches.name: Interactive Widget Playground
patches.description: Build your own mouse and keyboard interactive widgets using canvas.dom object and HTML5 canvas code
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Textmode Textured Torus
patches.description: Uses textmode.js to create a texture to uv-wrap into a three.js torus knot. Textmode.js sketch by @humanbydefinition
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Animated Wave Pattern
patches.description: Demo of textmode.js from 'animated wave pattern' sketch by @humanbydefinition
patches.author: @humanbydefinition

patches.name: Plotting Equations
patches.description: Uses expr node to create mathematical plots
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Matter.js Physics Simulation
patches.description: Physics simulation ported from Daniel Shiffman's The Nature of Code
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Assembly Stack Machine
patches.description: Example assembly patch demonstrating the virtual stack machine with color-coded memory visualization
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Uxn Pong Game
patches.description: Pong game written in Uxntal assembly, code from @compudanzas' Uxn tutorial
patches.author: @compudanzas

patches.name: IRC Chat Simulator
patches.description: Chat with your friends over the network using netsend and netrecv
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: MQTT Client Demo
patches.description: Send and receive messages via public MQTT brokers
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Vdo.Ninja Loopback Stream
patches.description: Send and receive audio, video and messages over network via vdo.ninja
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Console Stress Test
patches.description: Poom uses this patch to stress test the virtual console in the js object
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Handle Connection Test
patches.description: Poom uses this patch to test handle connection validation in many objects
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Textmode.js Filters Test
patches.description: Poom uses this patch to test the textmode.filters.js plugin
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Y-Flip Consistency Matrix
patches.description: Poom uses this patch to test the y-flip consistency across all visual nodes
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: Y-Flip Pipeline Test
patches.description: Same as the Y-Flip Consistency Matrix patch, but only for nodes on the rendering pipeline
patches.author: @heypoom

patches.name: GLSL Stress Test
patches.description: Poom uses this patch to stress test the glsl objects
patches.author: @heypoom
